commands.name: set-versions
commands.summary: set the patch version in the package.json files

commands.name: reset-versions
commands.summary: reset the patch version in the package.json files to .0

commands.name: watch
commands.summary: run npm watch on all projects

commands.name: clean
commands.summary: run npm clean on all projects

commands.name: regenerate
commands.summary: run node packages/autorest.go/.scripts/regeneration.js to regenerate all swaggers specified in the autorest.testserver

commands.name: tspcompile
commands.summary: run node packages/typespec-go/.scripts/tspcompile.js to regenerate all TypeSpec test content

commands.name: modtidy
commands.summary: run node .scripts/modtidy.js to tidy up all go.mod files under the current directory

commands.name: buildvet
commands.summary: run node .scripts/buildvet.js to build and vet all modules under the current directory

commands.name: gogetu
commands.summary: run node .scripts/gogetu.js to update and tidy all go.mod files

commands.name: gotest
commands.summary: run node .scripts/gotest.js to go test every module under the current directory
